Posts.Content: Breast Cancer. Grade 2 Stage IIA. Clean node. No chemo ordered.
Posts.Title: Hi. New here. With a question.

Posts.Content: Hi. First time posting here, but long time discussion board user. I finished radiation (after lumpectomy) May 14. Am having fatigue issues. Have had thyroid checked, and it was clear. Anyone else having issues with fatigue? Thanks.
